items.sentence: These old customs have been handed down from generation to generation.
Tom and I got to know each other quite well when we traveled together.
Tom told me it would be easy to persuade Mary to go to Boston with us.
Tom told me that he and Mary spent their summer vacation at the beach.
It\'s not all that uncommon for people to live past the age of ninety.
Mary is very beautiful, but she doesn\'t have a very good personality.
I\'m already twenty and I have no idea what I want to do with my life.
Tom decided to marry Mary even though his parents didn\'t want him to.
Tom certainly understands that we all need to attend today\'s meeting.
It took me more than three hours to translate that report into French.
